#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	string s1,s2;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>s1>>s2;
		int l1=s1.length();
		int c0=0,c1=0;
		int j=l1;
		while(l1--)
		{
			if(s1[l1] == '0')
			{
				c0++;
			}
			else
			{
				c1++;
			}
		}
		if(c0 == j || c1 == j)
		{
			cout<<"Unlucky Chef\n";
		}
		else
		{
			c0=0;
			c1=0;
		for(int i=0;i<j;i++)
		{
			if(s1[i] != s2[i])
			{
				if(s1[i] == '0')
				{
					c0++;
				}
				else
					c1++;
			}
		}
		cout<<"Lucky Chef\n";
		cout<<max(c0,c1)<<endl;
		}
		
	}
}
